name: The Origins
description:
This is a prototype idea I had for creating an RPG game similar to the atmosphere of Dragon Age: Origins and the open world style of the Witcher 3 to explain my view and theory on the story of Minecraft, more importantly, the ancient builders. Several builds are available, from the cutscene to just the simple testing of animations and the character in the latest build.  If you have any idea or suggestions, please put them in the comments on this page or any of my development logs. Thank you!

Note: I do understand this may be subject to copyright but I have no other ideas for the name, so I look forward to see your ideas.
